messages.message:
this JSON is part of the docs (and process) to package a Marketplace Solution, and the JSON does not validate
```{
  "name": "W2", // unique name ID for solutions in Marketplace
  "version": "1.0.0",  // always major.minor.patch
  "authors": ["Instabase"],
  "icon_url": "icon.png", 
  "keywords":  "w2, banking, loan",  // comma-separated string
  "category": "banking", 
  "short_description": "short description of a solution",
  "long_description": "long description of a solution"
}```
can someone with technical JSON chops help?
> Parse error on line 2:
> {	"name": "w2", // unique name ID fo
> ----------------^
> Expecting 'STRING', got 'undefined'
Iirc the json spec doesnâ€™t actually include comments
So the // and after would need to be removed if you want valid json
